Are you finished packing for school?

iVamo chacho! --He FLIES around the room, tossing VARIOUS ITEMS into th suitcase, throwing on a BLUE UNIFORM JACKET, the camera catching other childhood details--
C'mon, you a grown man now! Let show these teachers that. Let’s go!
--Miles! INT. MILES’ APARTMENT - LIVING ROOM BAM! The door flies open. FAST-PACED, Miles enters the li room, where his parents get ready for the day.

Mom. I gotta go...
(kissing him) In a minute... Miles rolls his bag down the steps as Rio calls out:
Papa! Llamame! See you Friday!
Okay, mami. Hasta luego!
Miles struggles down the street with the heavy bag, but h in his element. He walks by his old school, BROOKLYN MIDD passes some OLD FRIENDS, who he loves and misses.
Ohhhhh. Look who’s back! Yo what’s going on, bro?--
--Hey, I’m just walking by, how you doing?--
--Miles! éTe va bien en la escuela?-
--Seguro que si--
Yo, Miles did you feel that earthquake last night?
What are you talking about? I slept like a baby last night.

We miss you, Miles!

You miss me? I still live here! Wait, you miss me? TIME CUT: Miles RUNS DOWN THE STREET, SLAPS his HOMEMADE STICKERS on some things, ends by SLAPPING a STOP SIGN, ma a LOUD CLANG-- --but he trips on his shoe laces and falls into the stree

The POLICE CAR moves through the neighborhood. Miles is i the back seat. 1010 WINS plays.
Seriously, Dad, walking would have been fine. Reveal Jefferson driving. Miles' dad is a COP!
You can walk plenty on Saturday when you peel those stickers off.
You saw that? I don’t know if that was me, Dad.
And the two from yesterday on Clinton.

Yeah. Those were me. Jefferson stares, shuts down the cheekiness. Miles looks hurt. Jefferson clocks his pained look. It bums Jefferson out. There’s an awkwardness between Miles and his dad tha not there with his mom. They drive by a row of HIPSTER COFFEE SHOPS. Jefferson tr to bridge the gap with Miles, more cheerful:
Soooo... look at that, another new coffee shop... you see that Miles?
Totally, yeah...
--You see that one, what’s that one called?
Foam Party.
Foam Party, come on...and I see it-- everyone is just lining up! You see that, Miles--
Is that a coffee shop or a disco?
Dad, you’re old, man.

There are multiple reports of another mysterious seismic event last night. Sources close to Spider- Man say he is looking into the problem.  7. Jefferson shakes his head, disapproving, turns off the ra
Spider-Man. I mean this guy swings in once a day zip zap zop in his little mask and answers to no one, right?
Yeah, Dad.
And meanwhile my guys are out Uh huh... there, lives on the line-- SCHOOL KIDS run alongside the car looking at Miles, who slinks down. They bang on the window, teasing Miles, “you arrested?!”
--no masks, we show our --Oh no! Dad, speed up, I faces. Accountability. know these kids--

That’s not even how the saying goes, Dad--
--I do like his cereal though, I'11 give him that-- Jeff stops the car. The teens reach Miles’ window.
Yo Miles! You get arrested?
(mortified) --Oh my gosh. Don’t cops run red lights?
Some do... but not your Dad!
The car drives up right under the Brooklyn Bridge, to a school overlooking MANHATTAN, which LOOMS across the wate
The car pulls up. Miles sits, not wanting to go in.
Why can’t I go back to Brooklyn Middle?
(raises his eyebrows) Miles, you’ve given it two weeks. We're not having this conversation.
--I just think that this new school is elitist--
--Elitist?--
--and I would prefer to be at a normal school among the people.
The people? These are your people!
--I'm only here ‘cause I won that stupid lottery--
No way. You passed the entry test just like everybody else, ok! You have an opportunity here, you wanna blow that, huh? You want to end up like your Uncle?
(under his breath) --What’s wrong with Uncle Aaron? He’s a good guy-- --Jefferson FLINCHES, angered. Reins it in.
..-We all make choices in life--
--It doesn't feel like I have a choice right now--
Tension fills the car. They sit in silence for a beat. Miles gets out of the car and opens the front door to get bag Jefferson staring through his rearview mirror--
I love you, Miles.
Yeah, I know, Dad. See you Friday-- --Miles shuts the door and walks away. Jefferson watches, bummed at the state of the relationship. He lifts his P.A
You gotta say I love you back.
Dad are you serious? I wanna hear it.
You wanna hear me say it-- --I love you, Dad.
--You’re dropping me off at a --I love you Dad. school--
Look at this place-- --Dad, I love you.
Dad, I love you.
That’s a copy. Tie your shoes please! SEQ. 0200 - THE LOTTERY WINNER “TLW”
PAN UP from UNTIED SHOES -- Miles clocks them but defiant
--Miles walks through a LOBBY filled with TALLER KIDS in IDENTICAL BLUE UNIFORMS. A cutting-edge LAB SCHOOL in a converted industrial building.
I love you, Dad!  10. In a SEA OF BLUE, Miles awkwardly tries to interact like was on his street but everyone's so focused.

Hey good morning. How you doing?... Weekend was short, huh? (he turns to another kid) Oh my gosh this is embarrassing, we wore the same jacket-- MILES P.O.V. -- The UNIFORMED KIDS just pass by. Miles is discouraged.
Hey-- (hopeful) --Yeah?
--Your shoe’s untied.
Yeah, I’m aware. It’s a choice. And as his SHOULDERS DROOP he turns to walk into--
--A MATH TEACHER in front of a BAFFLING FORMULA.
--Who can solve this for XY?-- --A LOGIC TEACHER in front of an ELABORATE PROOF.
--And that is known as a syllogism. --IN JUMPCUTS Miles walks back and forth across the hallw Each time he is holding more paper and books in his arms, getting more and more WEIGHED DOWN.
--en este clase, se habla castellano--
--Tonight, read two chapters of Great Expectations-—-
--I’m giving you a take-home quiz on volumetric pressure--  11.
--a five page essay with your conclusions stressed--
Workers Party/ Take-home Work/ Industrial Revolution/ Incapable/ An enormous change/ Unstoppable--
--The MONTAGE BUILDS, a MULTI-PANELLED FLURRY--
He runs through the EMPTYING HALLWAYS. END MONTAGE.
Students sit in a DARKENED CLASSROOM, lit only by a large screen playing a DOCUMENTARY.

--countless other possibilities. There could be a universe where I am wearing red. Or wearing leather pants-- The door BURSTS OPEN -- MILES, out of breath, is silhouet in the doorway. The TEACHER FLIPS THE LIGHTS on. STUDENTS blink in the br light and grumble.
Mr. Morales, moving in the dark. You're late again.
Einstein said time was relative, right? Maybe I’m not late. Maybe you guys are early. Miles’ joke is met with unamused SILENCE. Except for a si TITTER from a NEW GIRL.
Sorry. It was just so quiet.

Would you like to keep standing there or do you want to sit down? Someone HITS THE LIGHTS. In the dark, Miles awkwardly mak his way to his seat, BANGS into a desk in the dark.  12. Onscreen is a PHYSICIST, identified as “Director, Alchema Laboratories.” She’s the consummate nerd and AMPED about physics.

Our universe is in fact one of many parallel universes happening at the exact same time. Thanks to everyone here at the Fisk Family Foundation for the Sciences, I will prove they exist when I build my supercollider. All I need is 10 billion dollars. Chump change, right? ON MILES, he BONKS INTO THE DESK of a NEW GIRL, paying ra attention and sits down at the desk beside her. Miles checks out the girl, who catches him looking. Miles looks away. Looks back -- she’s still looking.
I liked your joke.
Really?
I mean, it wasn’t funny, that’s why I laughed. But it was smart, so I liked it.
(taken aback, then) I don’t think I’ve seen you before-- --Ms. Calleros SHUSHES Miles, cutting him off.
Shhhhh! Miles sits -- checks out the new girl but she’s again focussed on the documentary. Miles is INTRIGUED.
Every choice that we make, would create countless other possibilities. A What-if to infinity.  13.
Miles stands in front of Ms. Calleros’ desk as she slides zero with a 0/100 written on it.
A zero? A few more of those and you probably have to kick me outta here huh? Maybe I’m just not right for this school?
If a person wearing a blind fold picked the answers on a true or false quiz at random, do you know what score they would get?
Fifty percent?
That’s right!
Wait wait!

The only way to get all the answers wrong, is to know which answers were right. You’re trying to quit. And I’m not going to let you. I’m assigning you a personal essay. Not about physics, but about you and what kind of person you want to be.

Miles stares at his STACK OF HOMEWORK. He takes out a leg pad to start on his Great Expectations paper. He sighs. Frustrated, Miles looks out the window for a beat. Miles SMILES -- he has a MISCHIEVOUS IDEA. SEQ. 0500 - A NIGHT WITH AARON “NWA”

Miles moves down a street, alive with nighttime city ener Once again the CAREFREE kid he yearns to be. Moving AWAY the Manhattan skyline and turning into--  14. --AN ALLEY, where he sees a light on in the top apartment
UNCLE AARON is texting on his couch when he receives a picture text of him, texting, from 1 second ago. Uncle Aa looks at his window and sees Miles--

(laughing) Uncle Aaroooooon! Hey! Were you scared?! Miles PRESSES HIS FACE UP AGAINST THE WINDOW making a fun face. TIME CUT -- Aaron washes dishes as Miles SPARS with Aaron PUNCHING BAG not-very-competently: MILES (CONT’D) You want that, huh? Unh. Unh.
What’s up with school?
Going great. Got tons of friends.
You can't tell me it’s all that bad there... smart girls is where it’s at. Place must be full of ‘em. Aaron walks over to the punching bag and holds it for Mil
No, there’s no one. There’s no one. Aaron walks over to the microwave to get some popcorn.
...-Yo I cannot have a nephew of mine on the streets with no game.
I got game! (fronting) There was a new girl, actually, she's kinda into me. You know how it is.
What's her name?  Miles 15. sits on the couch, and SCRIBBLES in his notebook.
(stutters, until--) --You know we... this is... we’re laying down the ground work right now. Uncle Aaron reacts, amused by Miles effort to sound cool.
You know about the shoulder touch?
Of course I do! But tell me anyway.
Tomorrow find that girl, walk up to her and be like... (does shoulder touch) "Hey".
(laughing) You serious Uncle Aaron?
I'm telling you man, it's science.
So walk up to her and be like... hey.
No no no no... like hey...
"Hey."
No. “Heyyy”
(mocks him) Heyyyyy-
You sure you’re my nephew, man? Miles’ phone vibrates. UNCLE AARON (CONT’D) Is that her?  16. Miles has a text from Dad: “Done with that homework?”
(checking his phone) I should probably go. Still got a paper to do tonight. Aaron sees this text and then casually but deliberately changes the subject to Miles’ drawings in his notebook.
--Yo, you’ve been holding out on me. You throw these up yet?
No, man, you know my dad. I can’t. --Aaron stands. He crosses out of frame, Miles getting
C’mon. I got a spot you ain’t gonna believe.
I can’t! I can’t I can’t--
Miles and Aaron make their way out of a subway car and wa for it to clear.
I’m gonna get in so much trouble.
Hey man, tell them your art teacher made you.
Hey, how did you know about this place?
Did an engineering job down here. SEQ. 0520 - SUBWAY SPIDER BITE “SSB”  17.

Aaron and Miles walk deeper and deeper down the tunnels a approach an ELECTRIFIED floor-to-ceiling FENCE. RACK TO a A1CHEMAX PRIVATE PROPERTY SIGN, and other HIGH SECURITY PARAPHERNALIA. Someone really wants people to stay out. Aaron expertly CLIMBS A FENCE, drops down on the other si Miles climbs the fence. We STAY ON AARON as we hear Miles struggle. Finally Miles lands next to Aaron.
Wassup? Uncle Aaron laughs.
Yeah man I knew we were related.
Aaron leads Miles into a huge space. Empty walls and spiderwebs as far as the eye can see.
Whoa... (then, for the echoes) BROOKLYN! Brooklyn! Brooklyn! The room is full of BEAUTIFUL STREET ART -- it’s a secret spot.
There’s a lot of history on these walls.

This is so fresh. Aaron gestures to a wall that’s been RECENTLY CLEANED AND PREPPED...clearly by Aaron. Aaron smiles, leans down to his BAG and unzips it, reveal KRYLON SPRAY PAINT CANS. He tosses a can to Miles. Presse PLAY on a stereo. Miles SMILES-- --and starts painting. Aaron turns over a BENCH.
Now you’re on your own, Miles. (then) (MORE )

Whoa, slow down a little... that's better... that’s perfect. Unbeknownst to them, a faintly glowing SPIDER descends on web, towards the ground and towards the cans! UNCLE AARON (CONT’D) (coaching him) The real Miles, comin’ out of hiding. Now you can cut that line with another color. That’s it...
Little help? CUT TO Miles on Uncle Aaron’s shoulders. For a beat afterward, they paint TOGETHER.
You want drips? ‘Cause if you do, that’s cool, but if you don’t you gotta keep it moving...
That’s intentional! Aaron traces Miles’ silhouette on the wall.
Wow. Miles steps back, admiring his work. A STRIKING PIECE, bu around Miles silouette with nothing painted inside it. A BLANK. “No Expectations” written above.
(suddenly embarrassed) Is it too crazy?
No man. Miles I see exactly what you're doing here, man. Miles smiles. So happy to finally be seen. UNCLE AARON (CONT’D) Yeah. You know me and your Dad used to do this back in the day.
Stop lying.  19.

It’s true. Then he took on the cop thing... and I don’t know. He’s a good guy, just... you know what I’m saying... Aaron's phone VIBRATES, he READS a message. A shadow acro his face. UNCLE AARON (CONT’D) All right, come on man. I gotta roll. Aaron walks out of the tunnel leaving Miles alone. Miles takes one last look at their PAINTING and takes a picture it on his phone. There's the SPIDER, on the back of Miles’ hand. It BITES WE JUMP INTO PSYCHEDELIC 2D ANIMATION, watching the VENOM make it’s way into MILES’ BLOOD STREAM, BUILDING UNTIL-- --Miles flicks the spider and it falls off his hand. UNCLE AARON (CONT’D) Miles, let’s go! Miles, hiding the bite, runs to join his Uncle. SEQ. 0700 - PUBERTY “PUB”

TIME LAPSE: As the moon rises, Miles shifts positions. It restless sleep, the spider-bite faintly glows, Miles star to sweat... While Miles tosses and turns, his roomate Ganke works on computer, taking a break to read “The True Life Tales of Spider-Man” comic book.
Miles gets up and puts his pants on. They are too short.
That's weird. My pants shrank. The words "that's weird" are VISUALIZED onscreen. Miles l up, SURPRISED by the sound of his own Spider-Man voice-ov  20.

I think I hit puberty. Ganke stops typing at this laptop, eyes wide. He quickly resumes his work as the words “I should have kept that to myself” appear thought-bubbled next to Miles. SEQ. 0730 - WHY AM I SO SWEATY? “SWI”
Miles walks the halls, awkwardly trying to pull down his pants that are now suddenly too short for him. As he spea

text: I gotta get new pants. Wait, why is the voice in my head so loud? (then) What-- --His strut is interrupted by a high-pitched WHINE that S when he bumps into the NEW GIRL FROM PHYSICS CLASS.
Oh! Are you okay?
What?
Why am I so sweaty??? Why are you so sweaty?

It's a puberty thing. I don't know why I said that. I’m not going through puberty. I did. But I’m done. (“cool” and deep voice) I’m a man. (tries to be suave) --So you're, like, new here, right? We got that in common.
Yeah, that’s one thing.
Cool, yeah. I’m Miles.
I'm G-Waaaanda.  21.
Wait, your name is Gwanda?
Yes, it’s African. I'm South African. No accent though, cause I was raised here. Gwanda continues, though her voice FADES AWAY...
Do the shoulder touch now! Before she walks away! In SLOW MOTION, Miles' hand heads toward Gwanda's shoulde she watches its slow, deliberate journey.
Why is this so scary? Am I doing this in slow motion or does it just feel that way?
.--I'm kidding. It's Wanda. No G. That's crazy. The hand lands. Beat.
(“cool” and deep voice) “Hey.”
OK then. I’1l see you around.
Oh. See you. Miles is mortified. Wanda turns to leave but is jerked ba by Miles.
Sorry... um... oh crap--

--Hey! Um, can you let go --I can't... let... go... please? Ow ow ow ow ow, calm down, it’s fine-- Miles is STUCK to her. He tries to unstick himself but it keeps getting worse. Now Wanda's hair is involved.
Miles, let go!  22.
I'm working on it. It's just puberty!
I don’t think you know what puberty is! Just relax.
Okay, I have a plan. Great.
I’m going to pull REALLY That’s a terrible plan. hard.
1... 2... --Don’t do this!--
Wanda finally has enough and FLIPS Miles, in full view of dozens of students. Miles SCREAMS.
Pre-lap: An electric razor BUZZES.
Miles looks on as his hand is freed from Wanda’s hair. Miles’ expression tells us her hair is ravaged. And it is
Nice to meet you. She won’t even look at him.
Sure. Total pleasure.
Exiting, Miles balls his hair-covered hands and puts them his pockets. He walks the halls, mortified.

No one saw. It’s ok. No one knows. No one knows. (everyone is staring) Everyone knows. Everyone knows!  23. The sentence “EVERYONE KNOWS” appears behind him, giant letters. The period appears last like a CANNONBALL.

They’re talking about me. They saw everything. He knows. She knows. They know. (distracted by a tall girl) Wow. She's super tall. Why is he smiling? Am I the weird guy now? What am I doing? How do I stop? Can they hear my thoughts? Why are all my thoughts so loud?! The SCHOOL SECURITY GUARD appears--
--Hey! I know you snuck out last night, Morales.
(V.O./THOUGHT BUBBLE)
Play dumb. (to the security guard) Who’s Morales? (V.O./THOUGHT BUBBLE)
Not that dumb. SEQ. 0790 - SPIDER-MAN SYMPTOMS “SMS” --Panicking, Miles TAKES OFF RUNNING.
--Hey! Miles rounds a corner and runs down the hall trying. He finds an open door and runs into:
Miles slams the door behind him.
You're okay. You’re okay. You’re okay. He’ll never find you. He SPINS to LOOK AROUND THE OFFICE, and sees, to his horr a PHOTO OF THE SECURITY GUARD AND HIS BUDDIES.  24.
No.
The guard reaches the door, starts to bang. We now see th sign on the door: SECURITY OFFICE.
Miles is stuck, yanking on the door. His HAND pulls away, ripping off the DOOR'S VENEER. He stands, his hands sticking to his shirt and accidental YANKING IT OVER HIS EYES.

What are you doing in my office Morales?! Morales! Open up! Unable to see he RUNS DIRECTLY INTO A BOOKSHELF, then sti to it, pulling it down IN FRONT OF THE DOOR. He hits the laptop and Spider-man’s Christmas song ("Spidey Bells”) starts to play.
Why is this happening? Outside in the hallway, the security guard notices the ki reacting to the song playing from his office.
(sheepish) It’s my kids playlist. --Miles TRIPS and ROLLS UP THE WALL -- circling the four walls like a dervish, he sticks to the ceiling and “break dances.” SECURITY GUARD (CONT’D) Open up!
(exerting himself) Stop... sticking! He falls onto a DESK CHAIR and then ROLLS OUT THE WINDOW!
Miles sticks straight out his window sill, sticky feet th only thing preventing him from falling down.  25.
Keep sticking, Miles! Miles struggles to get inside. He rolls onto an ADJACENT WINDOW where A FULL CLASSROOM of TRANSFIXED STUDENTS does notice the horrified Miles on the window--

...-what Hofstadter is suggesting... is that we... look underneath... --Miles rolls AROUND THE BUILDING, rounding a corner -- Suddenly BIRDS fly into him, and somehow become STUCK TO HANDS as they FLAP WILDLY, PECKING AT HIS EYES-- INSIDE THE GLASS HALLWAY, we find WANDA, watching Miles, little perplexed.
«+-OK... BACK WITH MILES, rounding a corner-- He’s back at his dor room!

My room! IN HIS ROOM, Miles makes his way through his window to th FLOOR. He looks up, breath heaving as a SPIDER-MAN COMIC floats down onto his face. (The True Life Tales of Spider Man) Miles lifts the comic -- it rips a bit -- and looks at it The two-page spread contains panels IDENTICAL TO WHAT MIL JUST EXPERIENCED: A Spider bite. Peter Parker pulling on door ("Why is this happening?", “Please stop sticking!”), rolling out the window, and finally lying the floor, exac where Miles is. MILES (CONT’D) (pure panic) How could there be two Spider-Men? There can’t be two Spider-Men. (V.0.)
Can there? SEQ. 1100 - I DON’T WANT TO BE A SUPERHERO “IDW”
On the cover: Miles leans against a glass building, 20 stories up. The REAL SPIDER-MAN is his reflection, but he bigger and cooler looking.
Miles races down the street. A phone RINGS.
Come on Uncle Aaron. Pick up. Pick up.
--Yo, it’s Aaron. I'm outta town for a few days. Hit you when I'm back. Peace. His thoughts racing in V.O.:
No nononono. It's not possible-- --The THOUGHT BUBBLE “NO’S” FLY OFF BEHIND HIM--

It's just puberty, it’s a normal spider, and I'm a normal kid-- --SCREEEEEEEEECCCHHH!!!! Miles races into the path of an ONCOMING CAR, but reflexes kick in and he VAULTS over it an INSANE SUPER-HEROIC leap that lands him twenty feet aw AMAZED PASSERSBY CHEER. Miles continues on, more freaked out than ever. SEQ. 1150 - BACK THROUGH THE TUNNELS “BIT” ONSCREEN COMIC BOOK BOXES: “Later...Miles searches for answers...”
Miles rides the subway.
I gotta tell someone. He scrolls to his DAD’s number. He thinks to himself for beat, then DECIDES AGAINST IT.  27.
He exits the subway, turns toward the DARK TUNNEL he and Uncle Aaron walked into.
You're being crazy Miles. You're being crazy.
The MURAL Miles made is still here.

Find the spider. You'll see. The DEAD SPIDER is there. Miles flips it over. It looks W and FLUORESCENT. MILES (CONT’D) It's a normal spider. It’s like boring how normal the spider is... The spider GLITCHES making Miles jump back. Suddenly, Miles hears a RUMBLE. He stands, STARTLED. The rumble STOPS. It appears to be coming from a PITCH BLACK ABANDONED TUNNEL. A surge of SPIDER-SENSE. Overwhelming.
Why is this happening to me? SEQ. 1200 - ASSEMBLY ROOM FIGHT “ARF”

Miles shines his light into darkness. This is SCARY. A LO BLUE TUBE, stamped ALCHEMAX, arcs into the DISTANCE, HUMM Miles’ spider-sense continues to direct him. Another surge of SPIDER-SENSE hits Miles and we hear competing thoughts in his head.
Slow down!/What am I doing? What am I doing? Miles picks up the pace, jogs around the corner, where Mi TURNS, a BIG SURGE OF SPIDER-SENSE and multiple voices ar heard together--  28.
Look out./I don’t want to be a hero!/Look out.
--You'’re like me--
--That’s all it is Miles.-- --You’re like me--
--WHAM!!!!! A SUBWAY CAR flies towards him from the next and SMASHES AGAINST THE WALL BESIDE HIM!
Whoa!
A massive staging room containing Alchemax EQUIPMENT. ZOOM IN ON: SPIDER-MAN. In mid-flight. Backwards. He wrec against some painful looking equipment. ON MILES, TERRIFIED. What's happening?!
Norman, listen to me.
Spider-Man?!
I cannot let you open a portal to another dimension! Brooklyn is not zoned for that! PAN to reveal GREEN GOBLIN, a 25' beast with massive wing He unfurls a big BIG BLUE TONGUE.
It’s not up to me.
Is that Green Goblin!?
Why won’t you quit?!  29.
I don’t know I guess I like Brooklyn not being sucked into a black hole?
I think I’m gonna go...

Staten Island maybe, NOT Brooklyn! As Miles turns to run, A GIANT BEAM CRASHES INTO THE ROOM Miles FALLS ON TOP OF IT as it swings back out into the r where Goblin and Spider-Man are FIGHTING. Miles hangs ont the beam for dear life.

No, no! Miles is tossed around the room as Goblin and Spider-Man battle. Green Goblin throws CLUSTER BOMBS as Spider-man swings ar them, and Miles avoids the explosion but now he's EXPOSED This is WAY more real in person. He runs down a MASSIVE HALLWAY, away from the battle. Mil catches himself before tumbling over the end of the hallw into a giant room. SEQ. 1210 - MEET KINGPIN “MKP”
He is now in an ENORMOUS CHAMBER containing a SUPERCOLLID

Woah!! Miles looks around the room, confused. MILES (CONT’D) What is this place?-- --Spider-Man and Goblin BURST through doors above him-- --Miles falls STRAIGHT DOWN, but Spidey spots Miles and-- --swings him safely away, high and far from the action. T are on an OBSERVATION LEDGE overlooking the collider cham A beat as they appraise each other. Then:  30.
Did you know your shoes are untied?
Uh huh.

This is a onesie so I don’t really have to worry about it. A beat. Spidey senses something in Miles. Their spider-se RESONATE. Like a mind meld. SPIDER-MAN (CONT’D) (thrown ) I thought I was the only one. You're like me.
I don’t want to be.
I don’t think you have a choice, kiddo. (gently) Got a lot going through your head, I’m sure.
Yeah...
You're gonna be fine. I can help you. If you stick around, I can show you the ropes.
(so relieved) Yeah.

I just need to destroy this big machine real quick before the space time continuum collapses. Don't move. See you in a bit-- --IN AN AMAZING, MIND-BOGGLING MOVE, Spidey jumps away an uses the MASSIVE CHURNING SUPERCOLLIDER to WHIP HIMSELF U until he’s ON THE CEILING, hundreds of yards above, and e level with a CEILING PANEL.

How does he do that?  31. He RIPS THE PANEL OUT, reaches in, pulling out COMPLICATE WIRING. He pulls a STRANGE COMPUTERIZED KEY out of his su and tries to plug it INTO A HANGING PORT. Miles watches, IMPRESSED. Spider-Man tries to put the key in the port, but it’s the wrong side, he flips it around, that’s wrong too somehow.

I always get this wrong. As he finally gets it-- a SURGE OF SPIDER-SENSE-- SPIDER-MAN (CONT’D) (looks up) Oh boy. --A PURPLE BLUR streaks overhead. Miles? Miles? (sheepishly) See that? He can uh, turn invisible... MILES, INVISIBLE, rides the elevator. All the spiders see the shed doors opening way up in the rafters. SEQ. 1690 - LOOKING FOR AARON “LFA”
WALKING DOWN THE STREET, despondent. Miles lifts up his phone, checks his messages. We hear his parents message:

Miles, what is going on with you? Nobody has heard from you. We don’t know what’s going on. Look, if you’re hiding something from us, you need to come clean. You call me back. Now. Miles PICKS UP SPEED.  89.
Miles CLIMBS TO the rooftop across from Aaron's apartment he does we hear audio of a PHONE RINGING and then we see-
Aye... he’s not answering me either. Jefferson is on the phone. Rio sits next to him. A CLICK-
--It’s Aaron. I'm outta town for a few days. Hit you when I'm back. Peace.
Aaron, it’s Jeff. Look, I need you to call me if you’ve heard from Miles. EXT. UNCLE AARON’S APARTMENT Miles is on the fire escape, he opens a window and climbs calling out for Uncle Aaron.

He has a soft spot for you and we haven’t heard from him. You know I wouldn’t reach out if this wasn’t important. Hope you’re good. cuUT TO, Jeff hanging up the phone, looking pensive. Rio at him. SEQ. 1700 - UNCLE AARON IS THE PROWLER “UAP”
Miles WRITES A NOTE:

Dear Uncle Aaron, I gotta do something and I don’t know if I can do it. I’m scared man. I’m just tired of letting everybody down. You’re the only one I can talk to. I just wish you were here.  90. --Miles stops writing when he hears a NOISE on the fire escape. Uncle Aaron? As the figure gets closer, the silhouette becomes clear: PROWLER. Terrified, Miles scrambling to hide. The PROWLER enters -- but FREEZES. Something feels wrong. Remembering, Miles LOWERS HIS SPIDER-MAN mask. PROWLER'S POV: He looks to the sofa, then around the room again, as if sensing something. He pads quietly, towards where Miles is hiding. Miles sits frozen, not daring to breathe. The Prowler is there, inches from Miles' invisible face. Prowler’s PHONE RINGS and he answers.
Hello, Mr. Fisk. I’ve got the security tapes from the tunnel right here. If the kid’s out there, I'll find him. Prowler lifts his mask, revealing himself as AARON.

You know me, sir. I don’t ever quit. Miles' eyes go wide. He GASPS and slowly backs away-- ---Aaron's head snaps up at the sound. He looks around th room and puts his mask back on... Aaron sees the blur, following to the window--
--Miles, as Spider-Man DROPS FROM THE LADDER -- Prowler i pursuit, LEAPING FROM THE FIRE ESCAPE. SEQ. 1725 - PURSUIT OF SPIDER-MAN “POS”

Miles RUNS, the Prowler in pursuit on his motorcycle. In the middle of traffic, Miles sees that he seems to hav lost Prowler. But Prowler follows from the rooftops, watc where Miles goes.  91. SEQ. 2850 - HE CAN’T BE A BAD GUY “CBG”
Peni and SP//dr finish making a new goober.
Noir lays on the couch, examining a Rubiks Cube. Peni han Peter the new goober. He hangs it around his neck with a lanyard.
(to Ham) This is purple.
No.
Blue?
No.
Has anyone heard from Miles?

Look, he’s just clearing his head. I know the kid. He’s got what it takes. I bet you he’s going to come back through that door recharged and ready to fight. Gwen stares at Peter, not believing a word he’s saying. J then-- --MILES STUMBLES IN, a WRECK. Heaving--
My uncle!
Hey, where have you been, we--
My Uncle Aaron, he -- he -- he's the Prowler!
Ok, slow down. Slow down, Miles.  92.
He works for Kingpin, he tried to kill me!
This is a pretty hardcore origin story. Miles fights tears. The spiders look to Peter -- who does have the slightest idea of what to say.
It’s okay, it’s okay, we’re gonna figure it out.
Were you followed?
No. I don’t think so. But they hear a RUMBLING... and then- SEQ. 2900 - AN EPIC BATTLE “AEB”
DING DONG! The door bell rings, then-- --CRRAAAAASSSSSHHHHHHH!!! Doc Ock suddenly WALKS IN throu the DOOR. A tentacle shoots out and knocks a tea tray out Aunt May’s hands.
Cute place. Real homey.
Oh great, it’s Liv.
(heartbroken) I guess I was followed.
Oh no...
Get out of here kid. Miles turns to run through the kitchen but is blocked by Tombstone.  93.
You messed up big time kid. Very sloppy. Tombstone pushes past Miles and we reveal SCORPION behind him.
Mira todas estas arafitas. We see the English text onscreen, along with “*translated from Spanish.” Peter and the spiders get into position.
Let me guess, you’re Scorpion? Well, we're the, uh... Spider-gang.
Would you mind taking this outside?
We don’t pick the ballroom we just dance. Doc Ock sees the GOOBER on Peter’s person.

Oh, I think I’1ll be taking that. Her tentacles reach out towards Peter and everyone leaps action. It’s a TEN PERSON FIGHT in a TINY QUEENS LIVING R Scorpion CORNERS MILES, who defends himself with couch cushions!
Ninoto dale.

Preparate a miror. A man stupid pillows! The couch cushions are STUCK to his hands and Scorpion ATTACKS. SPDR is there to save him as Miles gets unstuck the cushions. Doc Ock smashes Peter into the ceiling. Aunt May swings her baseball bat at Tombstone and knocks out the front door, onto the street.
I said take it outside!
The goober comes loose and Miles goes after it.

I got it!! Miles chases after the key but is thrown against the wall Gwen webs it away from Doc Ock but Scorpion knocks it out her hand. Noir catches it but glitches, dropping it. Miles continues to chase after the key as it is kicked ar the room. He finally grabs it when his spider-sense goes Suddenly, the Prowler crashes in through the window, land in front of Miles. Peter webs the goober out of Miles’ ha
I got this buddy. (to Prowler) Leave the kid alone! Peter and Prowler fight and struggle for the goober.
No, no, no. No! Peter kicks Prowler off himself and out through the wall the street.
You gotta go, man. Just then, SP//dr and Doc Ock slam into Peter and all are knocked out the front of the house into the street. SEQ. 2910 - EXTERIOR EPIC BATTLE “EEB”
The BATTLE is now on the rooftops and smashing out of the front windows, moving out into the neighborhood.
SIRENS in the air. Jefferson races through the streets.
.--All vehicles in the area, we have a disturbance involving multiple spider... people?  95.
(into radio) Yeah, on my way!

Miles gets up out of the rubble, the goober in his hand. PROWLER DIVES RIGHT AT HIM claws-first! Miles dives out o the way. The Prowler instantly regroups and comes at Mile again, relentless. He swipes with his CLAWS, narrowly missing Miles.
Give me that thing! Miles races through the house, the Prowler in pursuit. Th face off, the KITCHEN TABLE between them.

Don't be stupid, kid. Hand it over, now-— --Prowler SWIPES DOWN, DESTROYING the table-- Miles races up the stairs, Aaron close behind. He grabs Miles' LEG but Miles kicks him away, continuing upstairs the HOLE SP//dr blasted through the roof.
Miles scrambles up through the hole onto the roof -- but before he can swing away Prowler LANDS in front of him. M is TRAPPED~
Nowhere left to run. A standoff. Miles pulls off his mask...
..-Miles?
Uncle Aaron. Aaron takes off his mask as well.
Oh no no no no... Miles’ eyes WELL UP.  96.
(barely a whisper) Please Uncle Aaron. Kingpin calls Aaron from his car below, watching the standoff.

--Prowler, what are you waiting for? Finish it. A long beat...and then Aaron pulls down Miles’ mask, and backs away, his hands up. He smiles at Miles when-- --BANG! KINGPIN FIRES. Aaron’s eyes go wide as he falls b Kingpin has shot him. Kingpin AIMS AT MILES but Peter swings in and KNOCKS King down.
(to Miles) Get out of here! Miles scoops up Aaron and swings away. Jefferson arrives and sees two people swinging across the street. SEQ. 2920 - AARON’S DEATH “ARD”
Miles kneels over Aaron.
..-Miles...
.--Uncle Aaron. This is my fault. Aaron takes Miles’ hand. Shakes his head “no.”

No Miles. I’m sorry. I wanted you to look up to me. I let you down, man, I let you down. You’re the best of all of us, Miles. You’re on your way. Just... keep going... just keep going... With Miles at his side, he DIES. Miles can't believe it.  97.
Hands up! Put your arms up now! Miles stands but doesn't turn around. Puts up his arms.
Turn around. Miles instinctively CAMOUFLAGES. Jeff looks around, unabl see him.
Hey! Hey!!! But as he advances, he sees who the dead man is.
Aaron? Aaron. No... No. Jeff touches his brother's face, and recoils. ON MILES, CAMOUFLAGED, seeing the grief hit his father. Jeff's face HARDENS. He turns on his shoulder radio.

All units. I want an APB on a new Spider-Man. As Jefferson slumps we PUSH IN ON MILES, visible to us th way a heat signature is behind a jet engine. But we can clearly see he's DEVASTATED. SEQ. 3050 - WE NEED A PLAN “NAP” INT. VISIONS ACADEMY - MILES’ DORM - EVENING Miles is TEARING THROUGH HIS ROOM in an emotional, teenag rage. He pushes all of his homework and books off his des and his SKETCHBOOK falls open on the floor, the artwork h did with Aaron staring up at him. Miles picks it up and THROWS IT out the window. The notebook FLIES back through window like a boomerang, Miles catches it. Peter’s head pops into the window. He climbs into the roo followed by the other spiders. Peter walks up to Miles an puts a hand on his shoulder.
Hey, bud. You okay? Miles takes a deep breath, holding back tears.  98.
We've all been there. For me it was my Uncle Ben.
For me it was my Uncle Benjamin.
For me it was my father.
For me it was my best friend.
Miles, the hardest thing about this job is you can’t always save everybody.
Look, it was my fault. You wouldn’t understand.
Miles, we're probably the only ones who do understand-- --A JIGGLING AT THE DOOR.

Oh no... It SWINGS OPEN-- --Revealing Ganke, entering with his headphones on, playi music. Ganke crosses to his desk and we reveal the SPIDER TEAM PLASTERED TO THE WALL IN BACK OF HIM. Oblivious, Ganke grabs his Spider-Ham comic and starts to read, foot on his desk. He takes his headphones off and s in his chair, now FACING THE SPIDER-MEN, but with his com blocking his view.
(whispered) That way! That way! --and the SPIDER-MAN CLUMP moves to the ceiling and onto wall in back of him. Ganke then crosses back--
Other way! Other way! --and the SPIDER-MAN CLUMP shifts back to where it was.  99. Ganke sits. Lifts up his comic and lowers the comic to se SPIDER-HAM. Spider-Ham grins.
Hey there!

Do animals talk in this dimension? Cause I don’t wanna freak him out-- --Ganke FAINTS to the ground, unconscious. TIME CUT -- Miles puts Ganke into the bed. When MILES tur around, Gwen’s climbing through the window, only Peter remains in the room.
What’s going on?
Bye Miles.
Miles, I came to say goodbye.
We can say goodbye at the collider.
You're not getting it. You’re staying here.
I need to be there. So you can all go home. Miles picks up the goober off his desk.
They are going home, Miles. I’m the only one staying. A long beat.
You're taking my place...? If you stay here you'll die.
I’m doing what needs to be done. I just wanted you to hear it from me.
What about MJ?  100.
(looks at the floor) Not everything works out, kid. I need the goober. (then) Please don’t make me take it from you. Peter steps forward. Miles FURIOUS--
That’s not fair! You've gotta tell them I can do this!
It wasn’t their decision.
I gotta make Kingpin pay! You have to let me make him pay!
Miles, you’re gonna get yourself killed.
But I’m ready, I promise-- Peter does a combo move, nearly knocking Miles to the gro if Peter wasn’t there to catch him. Miles HANG DOWN, held by PETER.

Then venom strike me right now, or turn invisible on command so you can get past me. Miles TRIES to do what he’s saying but it only makes Pete seem even more right. Outside the window, the other spiders listen to their conversation.
Look, I know how much you want this, kid.
Poor little guy. Back inside the dorm room, Peter puts Miles down.
But you don’t have it yet.  101. Peter WEBS a desk chair under Miles, spins the chair, and webs him into a cocoon, and takes the key.
I’m sorry. Peter can’t look at him.
When will I know I’m ready-- --Peter WEBS his mouth.

You won’t. It’s a leap of faith. That’s all it is Miles. A leap of faith. Peter jumps out of the window and swings away with the ot spiders. Miles, tied securely to his desk chair, watches sadly fro his window. SEQ. 3000 - I AM SPIDER-MAN “IAS” INT. VISIONS ACADEMY - MILES’ DORM - NIGHT TIMES PASSES. Miles stares ahead. --KNOCK KNOCK KNOCK. He is jolted out of his self-pity by KNOCK at his door -- someone that can help him! Miles SCOOCHES towards the door excitedly, inch by inch on the chair.
JEFFERSON is in the hallway in full uniform.
Miles! Miles, it’s your Dad. Jefferson sees a shadow moving under the door - it STOPS.
Miles, now a couple of feet from the door, FREEZES.
Please open the door.  102. Miles starts to slowly BACK AWAY from the door, inch by i
Miles, I can see your shadow moving around. Miles STOPS again.
Yeah. Ok, I get it. I get it. Still ignoring me. Look, can we talk for a minute? Something happened... Jefferson struggles with what to say.

Look sometimes, people drift apart, Miles. And I don’t want that to happen to us, ok? Look, I know I don’t always do what you need me to do or say what you need me to say, but I’m... I see this...this spark in you. It’s amazing, it’s why I push you. But it’s yours and whatever you choose to do with it, you'll be great. Miles’ eyes are wide and soulful. He rests is head agains the door, so close.

Look call me when you can, ok? I love you. (then) You don’t have to say it back though. Jefferson still waits for an “I love you” back. When he doesn’t get it, he taps the door farewell and walks down hall. Miles CLOSES HIS EYES and we sit with him for a beat. Miles’ hands visibly RELAX as his venom strike starts to crackle to life on his hands - using this memory is how h learning to control his powers. Miles uses a mini VENOM STRIKE to BREAK FREE from the cha restraints. He CAN’T BELEIVE IT. GANKE BOLTS UP, dazed - but sees nothing -- REVEAL Miles has turned invisible and is exiting the building. He’s IN CONTROL.  103. SEQ. 3010 - MILES RISES UP_“MRU” EXT. AUNT MAY’S BACKYARD - NIGHT QUICK CUTS a hand opening the padlock. The LIGHTS in Pete hideout flooding on to REVEAL AUNT MAY sitting in wait, sipping tea.
Took you long enough.

Clouds gather. Total coincidence. PUSH IN on a gargoyle n the building's very tippy top. We don't see ANYONE. Until... Lightning REVEALS a CAMOUFL MILES. With each strike, we FLASH to Miles’ journey to get to th top of the building. FLASH! Miles exits the subway. FLASH Miles approaches the Spider-man suits in the Spidey hideo FLASH! Miles SPRAY-PAINTS A SUIT.
I see this spark in you. It’s amazing. Whatever you choose to do with it you’ll be great.
Our family doesn’t run from things.
You’re the best of all of us, Miles. You’re on your way. Just keep going.
When do I know I’m Spider-Man? BACK ON MILES-- Moving closer and closer to the edge.
You won’t. That’s all it is, Miles... a leap of faith. Miles walks to the edge of the roof, the wind buffeting.. and LEAPS! The camera is UPSIDE DOWN. Miles isn't falling through frame. He's RISING.

CUT TO Miles SPRAY PAINTING his new uniform. DISINFECTING MASK. PUTTING BABY POWDER ON THE JOINTS.  104. BACK LIVE, Miles is OUT OF CONTROL, flailing. Miles shoot web upwards between his legs...The webbing STICKS to a building... Miles SNAPS on web-shooters as Aunt May watches.

Made ‘em myself. They fit perfectly. Miles BEGINS TO SWING. He moves with purpose through New York, slides between taxis, across windows-- He swings up on top of the Brooklyn Bridge and catches hi breath. In the distance, we see Fisk Tower. He’s ready.
SEQ. 3075 - STORMING THE TUNNELS “STT”
The Spiders exit a bus. We see the WHOOSH of SPIDER-PEOPL swinging up to the top of a crane like a SWAT TEAM, until looking down at the PENTHOUSE, staring into SKYLIGHTS.
Kingpin has a private elevator entrance from his penthouse to the collider below.
Didn't count on having an audience. INT. KINGPIN’S PENTHOUSE - ENTRANCE SALON - NIGHT GUESTS mill beneath MASSIVE BANNERS depicting SPIDER-MAN
You've got to be kidding me. Kingpin stands. COPS and GUARDS surround him. He takes th dais, waves to the crowd.  105.
Thank you, it’s nice to be with you this evening to celebrate Spider- Man. He and I were very close. He was always a favorite of my son. Kids love Spider-Man, right? Still do.
What a pig.
(offended) I'm right here.
Hold on, get a load of how the waiters are dressed. It’s in poor taste but-- ANGLE ON THE WAITERS: They are dressed like tacky SPIDER- with bowties. SPIDER-MAN NOIR(CONT’D) It can't be that easy.
ON OUR SPIDER-TEAM, moving through the fundraiser. Noir carries a serving tray, while Peter and Gwen push a LARGE CART which is made from a CONTORTED, CRAWLING SP//dr.
It’s that easy.
And I just want to thank Mary Jane Parker for being here this evening. Our prayers are with you Mrs. Parker. As Kingpin mentions MJ, Peter spots her in the crowd. Uh A beat.
(gasps)
Pay attention! It’s not the same MJ, Peter.  106.
I’m sorry, I'll be right back--
No! Peter! Come here here! Trust me, I’ve been there. You gotta move on buddy.
This will just take one sec. Let me just-- Oh! --He turns his cart toward MJ. He bumps into MJ.
Hello.
Oh wow.
Um, I just wondered if we could have some more bread at table twelve.
Yeah! I’m just, I’m really sorry... ON GWEN, horrified.
Oh, don’t be sorry. It’s just bread.
No, I wasn’t there for you when you needed me.
Mmmhmm.. .
And I didn’t even try.
That's fine. I should really get going--
I know I could do better if I just had another chance to give you... (realizing) ...the bread that you deserve.  107.
Are you ok?--
Ma’am we'll take care of that bread right now.
It’s been nice, uh, talking to you.
For you they should fill this place up with fresh bread. Gwen ushers Peter towards the kitchen.
You alright, man?
Yeah. Totally.
OK good cause we are not getting any bread. The tables start to WOBBLE, people look down at their dri which now have ripples a la Jurassic Park.
I’m just sorry my family can’t see what we're doing tonight.
Doc Ock is hard at work on a computer, prepping the colli She hits a button--
Initializing primary ignition sequence. SEQ. 3090 - WHERE THEY FIGHT “WIF”

Wilson Fisk walks with purpose down a hallway. He walks p two guards and disappears into his office. As he passes, the guards are WEBBED. Reveal the spiders o the ceiling. Spider-Man Noir WEBS their eyes.  108.
(creepy whisper) Sleeeeeeep. INT. FISK’S OFFICE Noir SHOOTS at a panel in the elevator, allowing them to swing down the elevator shaft.
Kingpin enters with Tombstone and sees a waiting Doc Ock.
Start the sequence. Doc Ock NODS and a scientist takes a piece of hair from Vanessa’s brush to use as a DNA sample.
Uploading Vanessa Fisk and Richard Fisk DNA sequence.
Beginning scan for dimensional matches. Doc Ock fires the collider, a computer monitoring and cal the collider’s status.
Secondary ignition in 5... 4... 3... 2... 1. The COLLIDER FIRES just as--
--the spiders arrive! They make their way to the top of t THUNDERING collider, moving like a military unit.
DIMENSIONAL QUAKING occurs, worse than before, people PANICKING -- the BROOKLYN BRIDGE flickers, pedestrians SCREAM. Jefferson HELPS a CIVILIAN and sees FISK TOWER flicker in distance.  109.
They crest the hill and stare at the beam and the beginni of DIMENSIONAL COLLAPSE. ON GWEN AND PETER. Peter is nervous. So is Gwen.
Peter, you don’t have to stay behind. I can do it.
It’s okay. I’ve made up my mind. They all swing out to the ceiling of the collider room.
I'll put the goober in and take over the beam. After you’re gone, I'll blow it up. He starts to crawl towards the panel.
Good luck guys. Peter REACHES the panel. Peter is about to put the overri key into the panel-- When the Spider’s get SPIDER SENSE--
They know we're here. DOC OCK SLOWLY EMERGES out of the ceiling. Real creepy li
Nice to see you again, Peter. Doc Ock slams Peter onto the ceiling of the collider room The spiders rush to help Peter, but are ATTACKED by Kingp thugs. SEQ. 3100 - BATTLE AT THE COLLIDER “BAC”

[NOTE --- from here out we’re watching an increasingly psychedelic depiction of DIMENSIONS COLLIDING, and the Spideys have to do their job as it happens]  110. They BATTLE, the spiders fending off bad guys while glitching! As the CAMERA ROVERS the Spiders INTERACT. Noir glitches and is caught under fire. PENI comes to sav him.
I got you covered! --Gwen comes FLYING IN, sliding down a GANTRY CRANE-- She sees Scorpion coming towards her.
Ugh, these guys are the pits. Peni and SP//dr jump in to fight Scorpion. On the ceiling, Peter struggles against Ock. He tries to reinsert the goober but he puts it in the wrong way.
Why is this always difficult? Doc Ock drags him away from the panel.
Where are you going, Peter? As she pulls Peter in...
Any last words?
Can I get a minute to think about it? Do you have a pen?
Goodbye Peter Parker. Suddenly, one of her tentacles PUNCHES her in the face. P reacts to Doc Ock punching herself.
Who did that? She looks around. REVEAL Miles turning visible as he FLIES TOWARDS DOC OCK.
Miles?  111.
Spider-Man? He Shoots WEBBING, knocking her back as she releases her on Peter. Miles catches him and they both land on the ceiling.
Wow Miles! You’re doing it on command!
About time right? MULTIPANEL -- The Spiders react to seeing Miles again.
Hey, look who’s here!
Miles!
You figured it out.
I love you! I am so proud of you! Do I want kids? Doc Ock breaks free of her restraints and CHARGES them.
Oh yeah. I forgot about her. As they fight, they all notice a box raising up towards t beam.
Well that doesn’t look promising.
No, it doesn’t.
Vanessa and Richard start to flicker into existence as Kingpin watches from the observation room.
I’ve got genetic matches! Hold on... It’s too risky!
Shut up and turn it up!  112.
The Spiders all battle bad guys as the room descends into more chaos.
On your left! On your right! I got 5 o'clock, 3 o’clock, 2 o’clock! Every direction!
On your right! On your right! CAMERA flies back up through the building to the ball roo People are PANICKING. Jefferson is running against the ti on his phone.
Get to a shelter! I’1l be right there! INSIDE A HOSPITAL, furniture multiplies, the occupants panicking. Rio is on the phone with Jefferson.
Vamo senor. I’ve tried the school, but I can’t get through!
The VISIONS bridge “quakes”, cars split into multiple versions of themselves, people run, screaming.
CLUSTER BUILDINGS burst through the portal. The spiders continue to BATTLE as things get CRAZY.

head_text.subj: ON MILES, PETER, GWEN AND OCK

text: Guys are you seeing this?! Peter, Miles, and Gwen meet up on top of one of the colli guns. They look out over the chaos that is happening in t room.
Looks like our dimensions are coming to us.
It does look cool though, right?  113.
We gotta get back up there. Shouldn't be too hard-- Their Spider-senses go off - they turn around just as Ock THROWS a BUS at them! NOIR and TOMBSTONE have a hand-to-hand fight.
Is that all you got? You gonna fight or you just bumping gums you hard boiled turtle slapper? Noir PULLS A car on top of Tombstone. IT EXPLODES (COMIC

Scorpion has SP//dr pinned down. Peni struggles to break but Scorpion starts to destroy SP//dr, pulling off and destroying the robot’s limbs. As Scorpion goes to attack Peni again, an ANVIL SLAMS ont Scorpion’s head. Reveal that Ham has dropped it on him.
Puerco? What are you, some kind of silly cartoon?

You got a problem with cartoons? Scorpion and Ham fight hand-to-hand combat. HAM IS FREAKI INSANE AT FIGHTING. Ham knocks Scorpion down and before h can get up, Noir grabs his tail and swings him around. As lets go and Scorpion flies towards Peni, she grabs one of SP//dr's detached arms and smashes Scorpion with it. He’s out. SPIDER-HAM (CONT’D) Ohhh did THAT feel like a cartoon?

head_text.subj: ON MILES, PETER, GWEN AND OCK

text: Gwen and Miles fight Doc Ock, tag-teaming. Gwen is IMPRES by Miles. Suddenly one of Ock’s tentacles hits Gwen hard and she fa back towards the beam.
Gwen!!  114. Miles flies after Gwen, barely grabbing her. (Note: refer “Gwen falls” panels) He SWINGS back up with a recovering Gwen.
I like your suit.
Thanks. I made it myself. --Miles SHOOTS a web strand back at Peter. Peter GRABS the web strand and PULLS IT, giving GWEN SUPERSPEED.
That was adorable team! Now hold on tight! Gwen FLIES in-- They all hit her 1-2-3. Ock FLIES BACK from the impact and smashes onto a buildin Furious, she races back towards them.
Buckle up guys, this is going to take a while. Doc Ock is HIT by a rogue 18 wheeler.
Alright, never mind. Let’s end this thing. Miles TAKES CONTROL. He’s the quarterback now.
Guys, I got it.
I'll go. I'm the one with the goo- Miles holds up the goober.
Oh you gotta be kidding me.
Don’t watch the mouth. Watch the hands.  115. He shoots a web and swings off through the chaos in the collider room.
Miles!
Be careful! ON MILES as he heads to the panel, doing his own version Blonde Peter’s swing-crawl-flip to the panel.
That was crazy. Back on Peter and Gwen.
Ah we taught him that right?

I didn’t teach him that. And you definitely didn’t. Peter and Gwen swing off to join Miles. ON PENI, NOIR and HAM As SP//dr SPARKS and DIES, Peni takes out her SPIDER. She turns to look at the destroyed robot, tears in her ey Noir steps up, puts his hand on her shoulder.
You okay? (tenderly) C'mon... She jumps on Noir’s back and with Ham, they swing away to join Miles at the panel.
Inside is the MESS OF WIRES AND EQUIPMENT RIPeter saw. Mi INSERTS the goober.
Guys! I got control of the beam! Get up here!
Alert! Quantum polarity has been reversed.  116.
Kingpin’s looks up and sees Miles at the panel as the oth spiders join him. Kingpin, ENRAGED, SLAMS DOWN on the control panels in fro of him, SMASHING THE WINDOWS of the Observation Room.
The room SHAKES, inter-dimensional quakes ROCKING THE COLLIDER ROOM AND ALL OF BROOKLYN.
Guess this is it.
Well, nice to know we’re not alone. Right?
Yeah. They all look around at each other. They want to go home...but part of them wants to stay. Miles punches a code into the keypad and twists the goobe
I got the portal open. You first Peni. She smiles.
Thank you, Miles. From both of us. Peni JUMPS into the beam. Miles punches in another code a looks to Noir.
I, uh, love you all. (holds up a Rubik’s cube) I’m taking this cube thing with me. I don’t understand it, but, I will. Noir lets go and DISAPPEARS. Spider-Ham hold up a huge mallet. He’s near tears.
I want you to have this. It’ll fit in your pocket.  117. Miles takes it. SPIDER-HAM (CONT’D) That’s all folks. Ham JUMPS.
Is he allowed to say that? Legally? Miles turns to Gwen. A beat. Awkward. Just like the classroom, but...
Do I get to like the hairdo now? Gwen laughs.
You know I’m older than you. Fifteen months, but it’s pretty significant if you ask me.
Well, Einstein said time was relative, right?

Friends.

Miles lands on the side of the train and looks around to locate the panel.
I gotta get to that button. Just then, the window on the train breaks and a pair of h pulls Miles in. It’s Kingpin!

Don’t go! Stay with me! Please! Kingpin reacts and runs after them, dropping Miles. He en the train car and finds it empty... his family has gone b into the multiverse.

Miles climbs out of one of the windows and onto the side the speeding train. He looks around and locates the panel is about to web away when Kingpin BURSTS through the side the train and lands in front of Miles. He’s LOST EVERYTHI but he’s not losing the fight.

Kingpin and Miles fight, Kingpin with renewed fury. Kingp throws Miles off the train and they continue fighting as fall, drowning in Sienkowicz/Kirby Psychedelia. Kingpin and Miles CRASH into the Brooklyn Bridge. A dazed Miles shakes off the collision on the bridge, his mask off. He staggers to his feet. Kingpin is already standing, unsteady but still dangerous. Kingpin and Miles square off, two exhausted boxers. Kingp suddenly reaches out. He brutally shoves Miles to the ground. Miles rolls away tries to get up. He’s hurt. He looks up and sees Kingpin coming after him again. Kingpin grabs Miles by the head a slings him against a pile of debris. Miles smashes into the ground, tries to get up and slips.

The real Spider-Man couldn’t even beat me. You’re nothing! Kingpin is out of breath but he is enjoying beating the h out of Miles. Miles keeps GETTING UP and Kingpin keeps KNOCKING HIM DOW Miles keeps getting back up, he’s exhausted.
You took my family, and now I’m gonna make sure you never see yours again. Kingpin KNOCKS MILES DOWN AGAIN and approaches to finish off. Just then, a voice is heard in the distance...
Get up, Spider-Man! Miles eyes flicker open at the sound. He looks to the con room, where he sees someone moving around. It’s his dad.  123.
Get up! C’mon... C’mon.

(struggling) C'mon... c’mon... come on... It takes him a few wobbly seconds but Miles staggers to h feet and faces Kingpin. MILES (CONT’D) I'll always have my family. You ever hear of the shoulder touch?

In the control room, Jefferson is blown back by the force the implosion. THE COLLIDER SHUTS OFF. The shaking stops. Miles hangs from the ceiling. He did it. Some coughing catches his attention. From the debris of t observation room, he sees Jefferson stand up, coughing an shaking dust off.  124. Jefferson looks up and sees a spider web dangling but now MILES IS GONE. SEQ. 3175 - JEFFERSON AND MILES “JAM”
Jefferson leads a handcuffed Tombstone into a cop car. As the car drives off, his phone rings. He looks at it. I MILES. He answers.
--Miles? Miles? Miles?! Are you ok? ANGLE ON MILES, as Spider-Man, perched on the corner of a building, overlooking the scene outside Fisk Tower.
Yeah, I’m ok. (beat) You're probably busy so-- He’s definitely busy but doesn’t care.
No no no no, I can talk! I can talk. Look, so I came by earlier because, uh... your uncle...
I know Dad. I’m so sorry. A wave of emotion hits Miles.
Yeah.
Do you know who did it?
I thought I did. But I was wrong. (a beat) Look Miles, what I said at the door, it wasn’t just talk. Look you know, I was thinking maybe we could find a nice wall privately owned--  125.
(getting emotional, holding it back) Ok, dad. Alright.

--like at the police station and you could...”“throw” up some of your art? Man, I’m bad at this. Ok, Miles-- Miles? You there? (the line’s gone dead) C'mon man, C-Mobile-- Miles APPEARS right next to Jefferson with a POP--
Officer? SPIDER-MAN, aka MILES, right behind him.
(startled) Spider-Man. Listen, down there, that was, I mean I owe you-- --Jefferson is startled when SPIDER-MAN HUGS HIM. He awkwardly pats him on the back. They break it up.
I look forward to working with you.
Yeah, me too, I guess. (then) I don’t approve of your methods but, we’re just gonna have to agree to disagree.
Thank you for your bravery tonight. (then, quickly) I love you. Spiderman walks away.
Wait, what? Miles walks off, shoots a web, swings away.

And look behind you!  126. Jefferson turns and sees that Kingpin has been strung up webs between two buildings and there’s a note that reads “From your friendly neighborhood Spider-Man.” Miles walks down the street, high-fiving people. Everyone SO EXCITED TO SEE HIM.
Alright. Cool, yeah!
Yeah, thanks Spider-Man!
Yeah I’m Spider-man! A su servicio!

What’s up little man? Oh yeah, yeah I’m the new Spider-Man! Check it out-- (jumps onto wall, immediately falls off) Whoa! That was part of the move. SEQ. 3200 - WHY PHYSICS MATTERS TO ME “PMM”
ON MILES, swinging through the city.
OK, let's do this one last time, yeah? For real this time. This is it. We see the OPENING BADASS SHOTS OF SPIDER-MAN but this ti with Miles.

My name is Miles Morales. I was bitten by a radioactive spider. And for like two days, I’ve been the one and only Spider-Man. I think you know the rest. I finished my essay. I saved a bunch of people. We see him do homework. Swing in front of adoring crowds. hit by a drone.  127.
Got hit by a drone. Did this with my dad. Miles paints a tribute to Uncle Aaron with Jefferson.
Met my roommate finally. Miles, upside down, fist bumps Ganke. Ganke is stunned. M slaps a sticker on a gargoyle at the top of a building.
Slapped a sticker where my Dad’s never going to find it. Ham, Peni, Noir, Gwen are in their homes, ready for a fre start...

And when I feel alone, like no one understands what I’m going through, I remember my friends who get it. Gwen looks at a picture of her and Miles. Peter, holding flowers, rings the doorbell to MJ’s apartm Miles swings, flips, and runs through the city. He webs a train as leverage to CATAPULT himself through the air. He looks GREAT. It’s BEAUTIFUL, and SO SPECIFIC TO MILES.
I never thought I’d be able to do any of this stuff. But I can. Anyone can wear the mask. You can wear the mask. If you didn’t know that before, I hope you do now.
Miles climbs into the top bunk, turning out the light, pu his headphones...

Cuz I’m Spider-Man. And I’m not the only one. Not by a long shot. He closes his eyes. Starts singing along to “Sunflower.” his eyes snap open as a bright light suddenly shines down him. A portal begins to open up above him.  128.
Miles! Miles! Miles! You got a minute?

A massive lab space, so bleeding edge that it looks alien Holographic images of the Collider’s final moments (twist flowering cityscapes... giant floating pencils... Spider- etc) hover above the dozens of workstations filling the r We also get a glimpse of HEADSHOTS of Miles, Peter, Peni, Gwen. A HOLOGRAM WOMAN, Lyla, stands in the center of the lab, flickering from one screen to the next.
You're a bit late.
We can’t all be everywhere at once.
A little text might have been nice.
I was gone for less than two hours, what happened?
Okay okay okay I know what it looks like but, here’s the good news--
--oh here we go--
--the multiverse DIDN’T collapse.
Oh cool!  129.
A little touch and go, but it worked out.
Great story. Hey, did you finish the goober?
It’s not a goober. It’s a gizmo.
Do you always have to call me out? It’s just really frustrating and it bums me out. She gestures to a crazy WATCH floating above a pedestal.
Don’t get too excited Miguel it’s just a prototype.
Not excited. The gizmo attaches itself to the Suited Figure’s arm. SUITED FIGURE (CONT’D) Okay, ow!
You could be the first person to make an autonomous multiverse jump... or the last. The suited character stands stock still for a long moment considering the watch. We begin to PAN AROUND HIM...
Okay, so we’re just going to roll the dice on this?
So what do you say pal? Where do you want to go first? .-. finally revealing a DEEP BLUE MASK. NO EYEHOLES. RED, DAGGER-LIKE LENS FRAMES...

Which one pointed first?
Spider-man pointed first! Obviously! And we go out in pure chaos, the most expensive dumb joke all time...
